title: Number of homicides by firearm in the U.S. 2006 to 2018
summary: Overall Number of homicides has decreased over the Year.
Number of homicides is roughly constant from 2006 to 2007, and finally slightly decreasing from 2007 to 2009.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2007 and 2008.
Maximum Number of homicides, about 10225.0 was reported at Year 2006
Minimum Number of homicides about 9199.0 was reached at Year 2009
